# Learning global-view correlation for salient object detection in 3D point clouds (Neural Networks 2025)

## Point saliency maps generated by SFN  
The point cloud saliency maps generated by our method on PCSOD dataset can be downloaded at: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1_TFV4towamQX33Wh31NDMA (Code: 2nu9)

## Environment Setup
PyTorch 2.1.0 + CUDA 12.1 + torchvision 0.16.0 + open3d 0.18.0

## Train SFN model  
move to the code repository (cd code), put the PCSOD dataset under 'data/', and run:  
```bash
python train.py --log_dir SFN --data_root data/ --batch_size 32 --epoch 3000
```

## Test SFN model  
```bash
python test.py --log_dir SFN --data_root data/
```

## Data and evaluation  
Please refer to PCSOD webpage: https://git.openi.org.cn/OpenDatasets/PCSOD-Dataset
